Technique: ENGOBE; RELIEF; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate cone-shaped lamp with a disc which is marked with a moulding and with the beginning of a ribbon handle next to the orifice for fuel.  Paste of an orangey colour. The surface is covered with a reddish coating, partially lost. On the disc we find a decoration in relief consisting of small strokes and radial circles, and next to the opening for light we see a cross. All around is an inscription in Greek, bordered by dotted lines. The orifice for light shows signs of use.
